data.lyric:
[ti:Party Lyfe (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G/DaBaby]
[al:Hall of Fame (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Party Lyfe (Explicit) - Polo G/DaBaby
[00:03.07]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett/Jonathan Lyndale Kirk
[00:06.15]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett/Jonathan Lyndale Kirk
[00:09.22]Polo G：
[00:09.92]We live a party life turnt up all night enjoy the moment
[00:14.62]Uh you fought the hardest fights wipe tears from your eyes
[00:18.23]It feel good don't it
[00:19.69]Don't it
[00:20.05]Uh take off and let your hair down
[00:22.93]Went AWOL I see you here now
[00:25.20]Watch the gang ball they all care now
[00:27.94]And every claim false we don't care about
[00:30.59]Party life all night b***h I'm lit
[00:32.97]Dancin' under the starlights this my s**t
[00:35.44]CELINE hoodie and Off-White for my kicks
[00:38.03]Heard he ballin' part-time he on the bench uh
[00:41.38]Heart eyes for my b***h
[00:43.38]Tryna make this one night we won't forget uh
[00:46.41]And we still ain't been asleep 'cause we ain't tryin' to
[00:48.81]Gang f**kin' up the scene when we slide through
[00:51.36]Uh hoppin' out of foreigns stick on me while I walk it out
[00:54.49]It ain't 'bout money what the f**k we really talkin' 'bout
[00:56.60]Uh I remember million dollar schemes all I thought about
[00:59.10]Now we just party and bulls**t until they bring my coffin out
[01:01.72]We live a party life turnt up all night enjoy the moment
[01:06.43]Uh you fought the hardest fights wipe tears from your eyes
[01:09.87]It feel good don't it
[01:11.30]Don't it
[01:11.58]Uh take off and let your hair down
[01:14.54]Went AWOL I see you here now
[01:16.86]Watch the gang ball they all care now
[01:19.63]And every claim false we don't care about
[01:22.35]Woo
[01:22.75]DaBaby：
[01:23.04]Party starter I feel played and I'ma act on it
[01:25.40]To live this life I'm livin'
[01:26.21]I went through hell and I came back from it
[01:27.99]I think it's cute she say she never comin' back
[01:30.10]Ran into her three weeks ago exact
[01:31.29]And made her throw that p***y back for me
[01:33.18]Even when it's blue the flame ain't hotter than this
[01:35.22]W**d prescription d**gs I had it all in my piss
[01:37.87]One in the head of my lil' pistol make the biggest gangsta get low
[01:40.76]Shoot a n***a on stage I'll turn your show into a s**t show n***a
[01:43.62]Yeah n***as been hatin' on Baby from the get-go n***a
[01:46.10]But he still that n***a your kids your mama and your b***h know
[01:48.55]So f**k your win boy I ain't tryna party with them lames
[01:50.51]I'd rather kick back with my people
[01:52.04]'Cause family matters like the Winslows n***a
[01:53.41]Polo G/DaBaby：
[01:53.83]We live a party life
[01:54.74]Carl Winslow and them n***a
[01:55.50]Turnt up all night enjoy the moment
[01:57.27]
[01:57.79]Enjoy the moment f**k you mean my n***a
[01:58.92]Uh you fought the hardest fights wipe tears from your eyes
[02:01.49]It feel good don't it
[02:02.52]Yeah
[02:03.31]Uh take off and let your hair down
[02:05.63]This s**t can't be recreated
[02:06.41]Went AWOL I see you here now
[02:08.13]This s**t can't be duplicated now
[02:09.06]Watch the gang ball they all care now
[02:10.63]S**t can't be done like this twice n***a
[02:11.70]And every claim false we don't care about
[02:13.42]Go
[02:13.58]Be yourself
data.trans:
[ti:Party Lyfe (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G/DaBaby]
[al:Hall of Fame (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.07]//
[00:06.15]//
[00:09.22]//
[00:09.92]我们过着派对生活 整夜狂欢 享受当下
[00:14.62]你挺过了最艰难的战斗 擦干你的眼泪
[00:18.23]感觉很好 不是吗
[00:19.69]不是吗
[00:20.05]脱下衣服 放下头发
[00:22.93]偷偷翘班 我在这里见到了你
[00:25.20]看着帮派成员逍遥快活 现在他们都很在意
[00:27.94]所有虚假的声明 我们都不关心
[00:30.59]整夜都在派对狂欢 碧池 我激情燃烧
[00:32.97]在星光下舞蹈 这就是我的风格
[00:35.44]CELINE的衣服 脚上穿的是Off-White 
[00:38.03]听说赚钱是他的兼职 他坐在椅子上休息
[00:41.38]全心全意为我的女人
[00:43.38]想要让这一夜成为我们永生难忘的记忆
[00:46.41]我们依然没有进入梦乡 因为我们并不想睡觉
[00:48.81]我们出入派对现场 躁翻了全场
[00:51.36]从进口车上下来 我走出来的时候目光都朝我聚焦
[00:54.49]这跟钱没有关系 我们真正在讨论的是什么
[00:56.60]我记得那些价值百万的方案 以前我脑子里都是这种
[00:59.10]现在我们只会狂欢享乐 直到他们要把我抬进棺材的时候
[01:01.72]我们过着派对生活 整夜狂欢 享受当下
[01:06.43]你挺过了最艰难的战斗 擦干你的眼泪
[01:09.87]感觉很好 不是吗
[01:11.30]不是吗
[01:11.58]脱下衣服 放下头发
[01:14.54]偷偷翘班 我在这里见到了你
[01:16.86]看着帮派成员逍遥快活 现在他们都很在意
[01:19.63]所有虚假的声明 我们都不关心
[01:22.35]//
[01:22.75]//
[01:23.04]派对游戏 我感觉被人玩弄 我要采取行动
[01:25.40]为了过好我这一生 
[01:26.21]我去地狱走过了一遭
[01:27.99]我觉得挺可爱的 她说她永远不会回头找我
[01:30.10]三周前碰到她
[01:31.29]让她主动来讨好我
[01:33.18]就算是这爱火是蓝色的 也没有比这更炽热的火焰
[01:35.22]** 处方药 ** 我都试了一遍
[01:37.87]被我的手枪对准 最强的大哥也低下头颅
[01:40.76]开枪打死了舞台上的一个家伙 我会毁掉你的演出 伙计
[01:43.62]从一开始那些家伙就恨上了Baby 伙计
[01:46.10]但他依然还是那个他 你的妈妈 你的女人都知道
[01:48.55]所以别拿你的胜利沾沾自喜 我都不屑跟那群残废玩
[01:50.51]我宁愿跟我的兄弟姐妹放松放松
[01:52.04]因为我的家庭关系就像Winslows的一样 伙计
[01:53.41]//
[01:53.83]我们过着派对生活 
[01:54.74]Carl Winslow还有他们 伙计
[01:55.50]整夜狂欢 享受当下
[01:57.27]
[01:57.79]享受当下 就这个意思 我的兄弟
[01:58.92]你挺过了最艰难的战斗 擦干你的眼泪
[02:01.49]感觉很好 不是吗
[02:02.52]//
[02:03.31]脱下衣服 放下头发
[02:05.63]这绝世佳作没有第二个
[02:06.41]偷偷翘班 我在这里见到了你
[02:08.13]这作品不能被复制
[02:09.06]看着帮派成员逍遥快活 现在他们都很在意
[02:10.63]不能有第二个
[02:11.70]所有虚假的声明 我们都不关心
[02:13.42]来吧
[02:13.58]做你自己
